name: Pondering Reality
description:
This short VR experience puts you in the role of a wizard who wishes to travel to the future to look at cat pictures. A truly noble goal.

It's been tested using a HP Reverb headset via steam VR but should also work with other headsets via steam VR. It takes a while to load.

The quest version has been tested using a Oculus Quest 2. The Quest must be put into developer mode to load the .apk
